MaxWoundNotification.Title: Wound Changes
MaxWoundNotification.Body:
The original actor had one or more active effects modifying max Wounds.

Be sure to check the new actor to verify they have the expected number of Wounds.

ActorSheetDropDialog.Title: Add to Shape Change?
ActorSheetDropDialog.Body: Add dropped actor to the Shape Change power of this sheet?

CompendiumWarning.Title: Compendium Actors
CompendiumWarning.Body:
Directly using compendium actors is not supported.

Please import the actor into your world first and then use the imported actor.

DeleteTokenWarning.Title: Confirm Delete?
DeleteTokenWarning.SourceBody:
This token is marked as the source of a shape change. Deleting this token will break the ability to revert the shape change.

Are you sure you want to delete this token?
DeleteTokenWarning.CreatedBody:
This token is was created as a result of a shape change. Deleting this token will break the ability to revert to the original token.

Are you sure you want to delete this token?

Errors.NoShapeChange: Selected token does not have the shape change power.
Errors.NoShapes: Selected token's shape change power contains no shapes. Drag actors to the caster or their shape change power to add shapes.
Errors.NotAChangedToken: Selected token was not created by the shape change module.
Errors.OriginalTokenNotFound: The original token no longer exists in the scene. You will have to revert manually.
